remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可让你找到项最接近的鼠标指针，但必须执行自己的计算来确定此选项之前或之后是否应显示插入标记。The method lets you find the item closest to the mouse pointer, but you must do your own calculations to determine whether the insertion mark should appear before or after this item. 若要计算所需的值属性，请执行以下步骤：To calculate the value needed for the property, follow these steps: 1. 使用方法来检索与鼠标指针最接近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 2. 传递到的索引值方法来检索项的边框。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 3. 如果鼠标指针位于左侧的中点的边框，设置属性设置为`false`; 否则为将其设置为`true`。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅概述参考主题。For more information, see the overview reference topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能和实现拖放项重新排序使用的是标准拖动事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，鼠标指针的位置进行比较的中点的最近的项，并使用结果以确定左侧或右侧的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有指定索引的项的左侧显示插入标记属性设置为`false`; 否则为它将出现的项的右侧。The insertion mark appears to the left of the item with the specified index if the property is set to `false`; otherwise, it appears to the right of the item. 插入标记将自动消失时拖动的项插入到集合。The insertion mark disappears automatically when a dragged item is inserted into the collection. 若要插入标记手动删除，例如，拖放到本身或拖出控件项时，将设置值为-1。To remove the insertion mark manually, for example, when an item is dragged onto itself or dragged outside the control, set the value to -1. 使用方法来检索与指定的位置，例如鼠标指针定位在拖放操作中的某个项时的位置最接近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to a specified location, such as the location of the mouse pointer when positioning an item in a drag-and-drop operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能和实现拖放项重新排序使用的是标准拖动事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，鼠标指针的位置进行比较的中点的最近的项，并使用结果以确定左侧或右侧的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您可以查找与鼠标指针最近的项目时进行拖放操作。This method lets you locate the item closest to the mouse pointer when doing a drag-and-drop operation. 使用索引值返回设置属性。Use the index value returned to set the property. 当鼠标指针与最近的项目是正被拖动的项时，则此方法的返回值为-1。When the item closest to the mouse pointer is the item being dragged, the return value of this method is -1. 在这种情况下，设置属性为此值将会隐藏插入标记。In this case, setting the property to this value hides the insertion mark. 此方法将查找最近的项而不考虑在鼠标指针的位置，同时方法将返回位于指定位置，项或`null`如果在该位置没有项。This method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located, while the method returns the item at the specified location only, or `null` if there is no item at that location. 方法将返回`null`，例如，当鼠标指针位于两个项之间。The method returns `null`, for example, when the mouse pointer is located between two items. 出于此原因，您应始终使用方法时使用拖放操作来定位项。For this reason, you should always use the method when using a drag-and-drop operation to position items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能和实现拖放项重新排序使用的是标准拖动事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，鼠标指针的位置进行比较的中点的最近的项，并使用结果以确定左侧或右侧的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
